Ingredients: Arborio rice, Mushrooms, Onion, Garlic, Vegetable broth, Parmesan cheese, Fresh herbs
Steps: 1. Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil until translucent. 2. Add mushrooms and cook until softened. 3. Stir in Arborio rice and cook for a minute. 4. Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring frequently until rice is creamy. 5. Finish with grated Parmesan cheese and chopped fresh herbs.

Ingredients: Quinoa or brown rice, Roasted vegetables, Chickpeas, Avocado, Tahini dressing
Steps: 1. Cook quinoa or brown rice according to package instructions. 2. Roast vegetables and chickpeas in the oven until tender. 3. Assemble bowl with cooked grains, roasted vegetables, chickpeas, sliced avocado, and drizzle with tahini dressing.

Ingredients: Whole-grain bread, Avocado, Eggs, Red pepper flakes, Salt
Steps: 1. Toast bread until golden and crisp. 2. Mash avocado onto toast and sprinkle with red pepper flakes and salt. 3. Poach eggs until desired doneness and place on top of avocado toast.

Ingredients: Whole wheat tortilla, Lettuce, Cucumbers, Tomatoes, Red onions, Olives, Feta cheese, Tzatziki sauce
Steps: 1. Lay tortilla flat and spread tzatziki sauce. 2. Layer lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, olives, and feta cheese. 3. Roll tightly and serve.

Ingredients: Salmon fillets, Asparagus, Lemon, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
Steps: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 2. Drizzle salmon and asparagus with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 3. Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side, and asparagus for 2-3 minutes, until cooked through.

Ingredients: Corn tortillas, Black beans, Bell peppers, Onions, Tomatoes, Lettuce, Guacamole
Steps: 1. Heat tortillas in a skillet until warm and pliable. 2. Fill tortillas with black beans, sautéed peppers and onions, diced tomatoes, lettuce, and guacamole. 3. Serve warm.

Ingredients: Arborio rice, Saffron, Chicken, Chorizo, Shrimp, Mussels, Bell peppers, Peas, Tomatoes
Steps: 1. Sauté chicken and chorizo until browned. 2. Add rice, saffron, and vegetables, then pour in chicken broth. 3. Simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed. 4. Add shrimp and mussels, cover and cook until seafood is done.

Ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Basil leaves, Olive oil
Steps: 1. Preheat oven to highest temperature. 2. Roll out dough and top with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil leaves. 3. Drizzle with olive oil and bake until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.

Ingredients: Cauliflower florets, Heavy cream, Cheddar cheese, Mustard, Bacon bits
Steps: 1. Steam cauliflower until tender. 2. In a saucepan, heat heavy cream and stir in cheddar cheese until melted. 3. Stir in mustard and cooked cauliflower, then top with bacon bits.

Ingredients: Carrots, Celery, Zucchini, Tomatoes, Beans, Vegetable broth, Pasta
Steps: 1. Sauté carrots, celery, and zucchini until tender. 2. Add tomatoes, beans, and vegetable broth, bring to a boil. 3. Add pasta and simmer until cooked through.

Ingredients: Tofu, Broccoli, Bell peppers, Snap peas, Carrots, Soy sauce, Ginger
Steps: 1. Press tofu to remove excess moisture, then cut into cubes. 2. Stir-fry tofu and vegetables in a hot skillet with soy sauce and ginger until cooked through.

Ingredients: Spaghetti, Fresh basil, Pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, Garlic, Olive oil
Steps: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. Blend basil, pine nuts, Parmesan, garlic, and olive oil until smooth. 3. Toss cooked pasta with pesto sauce and serve.

Ingredients: Tomatoes, Fresh mozzarella cheese, Basil leaves, Balsamic glaze, Olive oil, Salt, Pepper
Steps: 1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella cheese. 2. Layer tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil leaves on a plate. 3. Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil, then season with salt and pepper.

Ingredients: Eggplant, Zucchini, Bell peppers, Onion, Pesto, Mozzarella cheese, Ciabatta bread
Steps: 1. Grill vegetables until tender. 2. Spread pesto on ciabatta bread, then layer grilled vegetables and mozzarella cheese. 3. Grill sandwich until cheese is melted and bread is crispy.

Ingredients: Black beans, Avocado, Lettuce, Tomato, Whole wheat bun, Chipotle mayo
Steps: 1. Mash black beans and form into patties. 2. Grill or pan-fry patties until heated through. 3. Serve on a bun with sliced avocado, lettuce, tomato, and chipotle mayo.

Ingredients: Spinach, Kale, Banana, Pineapple, Coconut water
Steps: 1. Blend spinach, kale, banana, pineapple, and coconut water until smooth. 2. Adjust consistency with more coconut water if needed.

Ingredients: Ripe avocados, Cocoa powder, Maple syrup, Almond milk
Steps: Dessert
column6: 1. Blend avocados, cocoa powder, maple syrup, and almond milk until creamy. 2. Chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve.

Ingredients: Baguette, Tomatoes, Garlic, Basil, Balsamic vinegar, Olive oil
Steps: 1. Slice baguette and toast until golden. 2. Combine diced tomatoes, minced garlic, chopped basil, balsamic vinegar, and olive oil. 3. Spoon tomato mixture onto toasted baguette slices and serve.

Ingredients: Cauliflower, Garlic, Butter (or vegan butter), Almond milk
Steps: 1. Roast garlic until soft and fragrant. 2. Steam cauliflower until tender, then mash with roasted garlic, butter, and almond milk. 3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Ingredients: Beans, Tomatoes, Bell peppers, Onions, Chili powder, Cumin, Paprika, Sour cream (or vegan sour cream), Shredded cheese (or vegan cheese)
Steps: 1. Sauté onions and bell peppers until softened. 2. Add beans, tomatoes, and spices, then simmer until flavors meld. 3. Serve with a dollop of sour cream and shredded cheese on top.
